title: The Kicked Out S-rank Appraiser Creates The Strongest Guild - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Alchemy   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Demons   Dwarfs   Early Romance   Elves   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   Popular Love Interests   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic
author: Seto Natsuki   瀬戸夏樹
description:
Appraiser Laurent was kicked out from his guild 『Golden Hawk』.

It was a result of one-sided jealousy from the guild leader, Lucius.

Feeling hurt and crushed by the sudden dismissal, a female mage named Lilianne gave him a helping hand.

Together with her, he decided to create a new guild to mess with Lucius.

Eventually, those talents that Laurent found through his appraisal skill will create the strongest guild.>
